title: Dramatic Recessed Lighting, Dishwasher, Easy Access to Freeways
neighborhood: 17621 W. Pauline Ct., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['At Colony Townhomes in Santa Clarita, our apartments are a place you will love coming home to.', "Each of our available apartments has access to a beautiful picnic area with a barbecue and play area, which means you'll always have a place to take your family and friends.", 'We also provide great amenities for residents, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a cool swimming pool, and a relaxing spa for residents to maintain their high-energy lifestyles.', 'Each of our apartments also feature a personal garage for easy parking.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Controlled Access Gated Apartment Community', '-Dramatic Recessed Lighting', '-Microwave', '-9-12ft Ceilings', '-State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '-Easy Access to Freeways', '-Playgrounds', '-Refrigerator with Ice Maker', '-Designer Berber Carpet', '-Majestic Views of Santa Clarita and Canyon Country', '-High Speed Internet Access Available', '-Five Soothing Spas', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '17621 W. Pauline Ct., Canyon Country, CA 91387', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
